name: Freya Fyrsdattir
text: Burnt cinnabon rolls and hand-tossed pizza was super thin. Overflow call center wasn't helpful. I wasn't able to contact the store directly either. Horrible customer service!

text: Mom called and ordered a special. Waited two hours no pizza. My mother called them and was put on hold for 1 hour. We went to the location and they told us that it was on our doorstep. IT WASNT. So we decided to go to papa johns. Kinda glad because papa johns is ten times better. Oh! Gotta go give papa johns 5 stars.

text: Absolutely the worse. Attitude and not answering phone calls. Just because they forgot to put in a call in order into the system. Literally stating that you definitely "shouldn't eat the pizza I make for you explicit." No oh no not again. Rather drive ten more minutes down the road.

You will be DISAPPOINTED!!

text: I was told delivery would be 1 hour twenty minutes. Happily, my pizza and wings came in an hour. However, I asked for delivery at my kitchen door. The delivery came to the front door. text: I was shocked that i was charged $29 for 1 medium 2 topping pizza and 6 bone in wings. I would hate to think how much i would pay for a large pizza. Next time i will make my own.

text: My granddaughter had to be hospitalized in Columbia.  We live in another state and wanted to cheer her up with a surprise.  I talked with the staff at   this Pizza Hut and they were most helpful and gracious with making this happen.  Thank y'all very much!

name: ryland Taylor
text:
Just had delivery in 30 minutes for medium supreme. Hand tossed. Got a large, soggy, nasty pizza. Will try to salvage in oven.
